bug.author: mahmoud-abuzaina
bug.summary: Inference Accuracy Regression for Resnet50 and Densenet
bug.description:
System information
Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): NA OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04): Linux Centos 7.5 Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device: NA TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): Source TensorFlow version (use command below): master branch, commit 0c1eb88 onward Python version: 2.7 Bazel version (if compiling from source): 0.15.0 GCC/Compiler version (if compiling from source): 6.3.0 CUDA/cuDNN version: NA GPU model and memory: NA
Inference accuracy for Resnet50 and Densenet has dropped to zero on CPU. This commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/0c1eb8861624d6d17c797b70d25330711df5eb2f>0c1eb88</denchmark-link> was found to be causing the regression. Describe the expected behavior Resnet50 inference accuracy should look something close to (Top1, Top5) = (0.7315, 0.9109).

comments.comment: Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/petermattson>@petermattson</denchmark-link> , can you please check this resnet50 accuracy issue ? Thanks.
Hi mysymp, I'm not right person for this one.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mahmoud-abuzaina>@mahmoud-abuzaina</denchmark-link> Could you check and let us know whether the issue persists with latest TensorFlow2.0? Could you share a code to reproduce the bug? Thanks!
Closing due to lack of recent activity. Please update the issue when new information becomes available, and we will open a new issue. Thanks!
